metadata.author: Tseng et al.
metadata.description: Induces leg regeneration in post-metamorphic frogs.

bioelectric_state.notes: Intracellular sodium modulation triggers MSX1 expression.

control_loop.monitoring_frequency: Every 8 hours for first 48h, then every 24 hours

feedback_mechanism.corrective_action: If above -5mV: Reduce ionophore. If below -35mV: Apply secondary pulse.

termination_criteria.bioelectric_marker: Stump returns to resting potential (-20 to -25mV)

delivery_method.notes: Slow-release bead provides sustained local delivery.

hardware_drivers.name: Monensin Cocktail
hardware_drivers.dosage: 10 mM stock, 50 μL applied to bead
